name: Explorer XXXI
overview: The planet earth has gone through a torment to space-time. The consequences have been disastrous: the interim particle poral RZ-800, stabilizer of the Earth orbit, has been catapulted into the past. Without the pair intertemporal ticula the fate of the earth is cast: it will precipitate without remedy against the Sun. You have been designated by the council as the one who will try to save the earth. !!Good luck!!
